column3: woooooooo!! I just had the best slab of ribs here at Chicago's own Smoque BBQ. Until now my local hometown buzz and neds reigned supreme...but this rich
column6: Smokey charred meat marshmallows in my mouth goodness Â the brisket here is amazing too
column7: I would recommend the sliced brisket and the St. Louis ribs over the baby back ribs.
